LanguageData.TM_DemonR.label: Demon
LanguageData.TM_DemonR.description: Released from the pits of hell, this demon will unleash its unfettered malice upon any and all beings in its path. There is no reasoning or subjugating the demon; destroy it or be destroyed.
LanguageData.TM_DemonR.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.TM_DemonR.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.TM_DemonR.tools.2.label: hoof
LanguageData.TM_DemonR_Corpse.label: Demon corpse
